The majority of tourists visiting Sri Lanka from the top source markets of Russia, India, Germany,
the  United  Kingdom,  France,  and Israel, travelled  to  Sri  Lanka for  pleasure  or  vacation.
Specifically, 57% of tourists from Russia, 52.4% from India, 70% from Germany, 52% from the
United Kingdom, 70% from France, and 69% from Israel visited Sri Lanka for this purpose. It is
noteworthy that for majority of tourists from Canada(73%) and Australia(67%) the main purpose
of visit  was  seeing  their friends  and  relatives.  Only 20%  of  tourists  from Canada  and  23%  of
tourists from Australia had come for pleasure/vacation purpose. Further 18.5% of tourists from
